data.message: Why do birthday wishes stay on my timeline and i can not hide them-it always say error processing your request please fix it asap. It is extremely annoying that I have little control of my timeline entries. This has been going on for months now.

replies.message: Hi JA. Learn how to hide or remove a post from your timeline here: http://bit.ly/2tJBbP9. You can also prevent people from posting on your timeline. Learn more: http://bit.ly/2uah7Gt. Hope this helps! -Ashley
Facebook This does not work on my time line all I get is a message saying error processing your request and the menu does not open.
See my message with screen captures about the error message.
